text: Reinhard Höppner (2 December 1948 - 9 June 2014) was an (East) German politician, mathematician, and writer. He was a member of the Social Democratic Party of Germany (SPD). He was Minister-President of Saxony-Anhalt from July 1994 until 16 May 2002. The role was taken by Wolfgang Böhmer after Höppner's term was over. Höppner was born in Haldensleben, Saxony-Anhalt, East Germany. He performed several leading positions in the Evangelical Church in Germany.www.kirchentag.de Höppner died from cancer on 9 June 2014 in Magdeburg, Saxony-Anhalt, aged 65. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1948 births Category:2014 deaths Category:German Lutherans Category:German mathematicians Category:German writers Category:Members of the Volkskammer Category:Ministers-President of Germany Category:Politicians from Saxony-Anhalt Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany
title: Reinhard Höppner
